      • addProduct

        public void addProduct​(java.lang.String department,
                       java.lang.String name,
                       float price,
                       int barcodeId,
                       int count)
        Adds a product to the store
        Specified by:
        addProduct in interface GroceryStoreInterface
        Parameters:
        department - - represents a department to which is the product added
        name - - represents the name of the new product
        price - - represents the price of the new product
        barcodeId - - is the bar-code number of the new product
        count - - is the number of items of the new product in the store

      • addFreshProduct

                            float pricePerKg,
                            int barcodeId,
                            float amountInKg)
        Adds a fresh product to the store
        Specified by:
        addFreshProduct in interface GroceryStoreInterface
        Parameters:
        name - - represents the name of the new fresh product
        pricePerKg - - represents the price of the new fresh product
        barcodeId - - is the bar-code number of the new fresh product (identifying only the type)
        amountInKg - - is the amount in kilograms the new fresh product in the store

      • addToBasket

        public void addToBasket​(int barcodeId,
                        int count,
                        int customerId)
        Adds a product to the basket for a specific client. Make sure you adjust the amount of the product that is available at the store for others.
        Specified by:
        addToBasket in interface GroceryStoreInterface
        Parameters:
        barcodeId - - the bar code of the product that is added to the basket
        count - - number of the packages of the product that is added to the basket
        customerId - - the client id that is adding the product to the basket

        Parameters:
        barcodeId - - the bar code of the product to search

      • removeFromBasket

        public void removeFromBasket​(int barcodeId,
                             int count,
                             int customerId)

        Specified by:
        removeFromBasket in interface GroceryStoreInterface
        Parameters:
        barcodeId - - the bar code of the product that is removed added from the basket
        count - - number of the packages of the product that is removed from the basket
        customerId - - the client id that is removing the product from the basket

      • requestFreshProduct

        public void requestFreshProduct​(int barcodeId,
                                float amount,
                                int customerId)
        Requests an amount in kg of the fresh product. If the request is successful, it is automatically added to the basket.
        Specified by:
        requestFreshProduct in interface GroceryStoreInterface
        Parameters:
        barcodeId - - the bar code of the fresh product that is requested by the client
        amount - - amount in kilograms that is requested by the client
        customerId - - the client id of the client making the request

      • serveNextRequest

        public boolean serveNextRequest()
        Processes the next request in the queue. If the request can be produces then it adds the product to the basket. Note: Fresh product cannot be removed from the basket. Once it is requested it has to be paid by the client
        Specified by:
        serveNextRequest in interface GroceryStoreInterface
        Returns:
        true if the next request was successfully processed, false otherwise

      • printRequests

        public void printRequests()
        This method will print currently unserved requests that are waiting to be processed

      • printUnservedRequests

        public void printUnservedRequests()
        This method adds a new department to the store
        Specified by:
        printUnservedRequests in interface GroceryStoreInterface
        Parameters:
        departmentName - - is the name of the department that is added to the store

        Specified by:

        Specified by:
